resource: 1003206.description=Driver's and front passenger’s seatbelt warning buzzersThe driver’s and front passenger’s seatbelt warning buzzers sound to alert the driver and front passenger that his or her seatbelt is not fastened. The buzzer sounds intermittently for 10 seconds after the vehicle has reached a speed of 12 mph (20 km/h). Then, if the seatbelt is still unfastened, the buzzer will sound at a different tone for 20 more seconds. 1003206.1002622.description=Driver's and front passenger’s seatbelt warning buzzersThe driver’s and front passenger’s seatbelt warning buzzers sound to alert the driver and front passenger that his or her seatbelt is not fastened. The buzzer sounds intermittently for 10 seconds after the vehicle has reached a speed of 12 mph (20 km/h). Then, if the seatbelt is still unfastened, the buzzer will sound at a different tone for 20 more seconds. 1003206.vtc=true 1003206.source=MANUAL_IMPORT
